q1: What makes a good channel name?
a1: A good channel name is memorable, easy to spell, relevant to your niche, and available across social platforms.
q2: Can I change my channel name later?
a2: Yes, YouTube allows you to change your channel name, but frequent changes can confuse your audience.
q3: How long should a channel name be?
a3: Keep it under 20 characters for best results. Shorter names are easier to remember and search for.
